name: places/ChIJ0T4PcRhawokR3cEhFXYt_Q4
formattedAddress: 175 Greenwich Street 38th Floor, #08B, New York, NY 10007, USA
adrFormatAddress: 175 Greenwich Street 38th Floor, #08B, New York, NY 10007, USA

originalText.text:
Former Employee

Bespoke is hands down the best place I've worked. My background is in recruitment & I came from many different sectors, but this was my best experience.

Alastair is an incredible boss who cares very much about his employees & what they are going through personally. He is always willing to listen and figure out ways to navigate things together.

Having my degree in interior design, recruiting in the field was such a great experience. Going to client meetings, interviewing different architects & designers, and becoming close with my team was something I'll remember forever.

When I started working for Bespoke NYC, I went through training with Alastair. The training was so clear-cut and straightforward. Compared to other recruitment firms I have worked for, this training was the best and easiest to understand. Additionally, every quarter, each employee sits down with Alastair and goes through the next quarter plan. These are tailored specifically to each employee. It's super encouraging and motivating. 10/10 recommend!

originalText.text: My experience with Bespoke was simply outstanding. The team consists of top-notch professionals who are genuinely invested in their clients' career growth. They provided me with invaluable feedback on my portfolio and resume, which helped me improve them significantly. I'm grateful for the opportunity to work with them and would highly recommend their services to anyone looking to advance their career. A special shout-out to Brian Baxter, who represented the company at the recent Toch U event on brand building. His insights were truly inspiring. Thank you, Bespoke!

A special shout-out to Brian Baxter, who represented the company at the recent Toch U event on brand building. His insights were truly inspiring. Thank you, Bespoke!

originalText.text: Words can't explain how thankful I am for Bespoke Careers. I lost my admin job during the pandemic.  It was a job I really liked, one I enjoyed. After the world started running normal again. I was having a rough time finding a job that suited me or one I enjoyed. That's when I got help from Chris McCaffery and Samira Sohi of Bespoke Careers. These two amazing individual with the patience of saints helped me secure a job that I enjoy again and honestly helped me with getting my post pandemic life together. Thank you so much Chris and Samira I don't know where I'd be without you both lol. Not all heroes wear capes some helps you find doors to open like they did for me. I've been recommending Bespoke Careers ever since. If you're  looking to get your career in the design world moving ,look no further to this amazing firm to give you the push you need.

originalText.text: My experience working with Bespoke Careers and my recruiter, Samira Sohi has been positive to date. This is the first time working with a recruiter and my first time adding a review. She is warm, friendly and knowledgeable advocate. I highly recommend connecting with Bespoke to find new work opportunities and hopefully you will get to work with Samira. Looking forward to this adventure in matching me to my new place!

Looking forward to this adventure in matching me to my new place!

originalText.text:
I have greatly enjoyed working with Bespoke Careers and they have helped me land a dream job! I most recently worked with Nikki Thomas who was exceptional and I cannot recommend her enough.

Nikki has helped guide me through the interview process and was always available for any questions I had. She was a great supporter of my transition from another industry and helped me get back into the design world.

Throughout my search I have also had great conversations with Abigail Guignard, met with Annie Polachek and Alaistar Wallace, who have all greatly helped shape my search, identify my strengths and weaknesses, as well as make valuable recommendations.

This is my second time working with Bespoke and in the past I have worked with Tim Furzer who was also very professional and helped me get interviews at top design firms. I recommend Bespoke to anyone who is interested in finding a new role in the design space as the team recruits for top of the line clients and is diligent to find the perfect match.
